title: Firmware PS3 - 4.91
installation_guide: install firmware 4.91 normally after installing when rpcs3 starts compiling the firmware ppu close the app
Open the App Install ppu rpcs3 and Click on install ppu modules
Browse for the PPU FIRMWARE 4.91.zip file and select
Now a dialog should appear. You must click on select, then go to rpcs3 and click on select folder.

title: Red Dead Redemption
installation_guide: Enable Accurate xfloat option in RPCS3 advanced CPU settings
Set Anisotropic Filter to 16x for best visuals

title: Grand Theft Auto V
installation_guide: Download all three PPU files required for this game
Place files in /dev_hdd0/cache/ folder within your RPCS3 installation
Configure RPCS3 with recommended GTA V settings (Resolution Scale: 150%, SPU Threads: 2)
Verify all files are loaded before launching the game
Set Frame Limit to 30 FPS for best stability
